name: Transporter - Steel Wheels
description:
Engaged in transportation. Buy and upgrade new trucks. Conquer the peak.
You have to carry a variety of loads ranging from wooden boxes and finishing with gold. As you progress through the game you will be able to buy new, more powerful and roomy trucks. Upgrade your truck that would take heavy track.
To load the trailer, it will allow you to easily overcome the difficult sections of the route.
For the delivery of the goods you will receive the money that can be spent on new cars and to improve them.

Features:
- Realistic physics of cars;
- The ability to buy new trucks;
- The opportunity to improve your truck;
- 7 different locations;
- Loading of cargo;
- Realistic environment;
